name: Snow Mercy
description:
Blending the fast-paced action of a Shooter, with the resource management and squad-based strategy of an RTS, Snow Mercy is fresh new entry into the party game genre that challenges the notion that approachable shooters can't have depth.

Whether online, or split screen, you and up to 3 other friends will each take control of an army of snowmen you'll build up with the available resources. Balance resource gathering, offense, and defense to take down your opponents snow fortresses before they take down yours!
